app_descript:
App Name: Oasis
App Package Name: com.oasis.world

Brief

Step into a virtual realm where creativity meets community in the app Oasis. Immerse yourself in a digital universe that allows you to craft an avatar that echoes your unique style and spirit. Engage in diverse activities, connect with friends, and live out a virtual life tailored to your desires. With Oasis, transcend the boundaries of reality and embark on an adventure limited only by your imagination.
